results.name: Möbius transform of A294898, where A294898(n) = A005187(n) - A000203(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
mathematica: Table[DivisorSum[n, MoebiusMu[n/#] (2 # - DigitCount[2 #, 2, 1] - DivisorSigma[1, #]) &], {n, 82}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 11 2019 *)
